ygData.subject: Re:  Why me?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually a guildmate of mine encountered this beast and wrote a tale about it that will be posted on my guild website in the net few days.  When it is I
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, 24 Jul 1999, Michal Hobson wrote:
> P.S. Has anyone else encountered Terrorantula? He ate our lunch today too.
> I had never even heard of him or her whatever it is. It has to be the
> biggest creature I have seen to date. Anyone else have a fun encounter
> with this behemoth? Feel free to share.

Actually a guildmate of mine encountered this beast and wrote a tale about
it that will be posted on my guild website in the net few days. When it
is I will gladly post the url for you. I thought it was interesting read,
though to be honest I thought he wrote the story for roleplaying sake and
mad that spider up.

Treilanin Loreweaver Bard of Kelethin
Aariel Mage of Felwith
Honour Guard, Karana
